participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, health-conscious, and motivated. Enjoys outdoor activities and values a balanced lifestyle.
participant_1.background: I enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. I hate the color pink. My father was a construction worker. I don't drink alcohol. I'm a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Determined, energetic, and supportive. Passionate about fitness and helping others achieve their goals.
participant_2.background: I'm a cancer survivor. My parents were both very athletic. I got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. I am a clean eater. I love running and preparing for marathons.

content.text: Hey! Are you a huge coffee lover? Because I am.
What do you do for a living?
i am going to be a life coach
That is great! I love to hike and paint my spare time
I like running, I like to run
I am a mechanic, what about you?
